languages.text: "Все, что у вас есть сейчас, вы получили на золотом блюдечке. Но достойны ли вы этого?"
"Everything you now have was served to you on a silver platter. But do you deserve it?"
languages.original_text: "Все, что у вас есть сейчас, вы получили на золотом блюдечке. Но достойны ли вы этого?"

traits.locale_text: "Everything you've got now had been brought to you on a silver platter. But do you deserve it?"
"Everything you've got now had been brought to you on a silver platter. But do you deserve it?"
"Everything you now have was served to you on a silver platter. But do you deserve it?"
"Everything you now have was served to you on a silver platter. But do you deserve it?"
"Everything you now have was served to you on a silver platter. But do you deserve it?"

languages.text: “你不费吹灰之力就得到了如今拥有的一切，你真的能够心安理得地享受这一切吗？”
languages.original_text: "Everything you now have was served to you on a silver platter. But do you deserve it?"

traits.locale_text: “你不费吹灰之力就得到了如今拥有的一切，你真的能够心安理得地享受这一切吗？”

languages.text: «Todo cuanto tienes ahora te lo han servido en bandeja de plata. ¿Pero qué has hecho para merecerlo?».
languages.original_text: "Everything you now have was served to you on a silver platter. But do you deserve it?"

traits.locale_text: «Todo cuanto tienes ahora te lo han servido en bandeja de plata. ¿Pero qué has hecho para merecerlo?».

languages.text: « Tout ce que vous possédez aujourd'hui vous a été servi sur un plateau d'argent, mais l'avez-vous réellement mérité ? »
languages.original_text: "Everything you now have was served to you on a silver platter. But do you deserve it?"

traits.locale_text: « Tout ce que vous possédez aujourd'hui vous a été servi sur un plateau d'argent, mais l'avez-vous réellement mérité ? »

languages.text: "Alles, was Ihr jetzt habt, wurde Euch auf einem Silbertablett präsentiert. Aber habt Ihr es auch verdient?"
languages.original_text: "Everything you now have was served to you on a silver platter. But do you deserve it?"

traits.locale_text: "Alles, was Ihr jetzt habt, wurde Euch auf einem Silbertablett präsentiert. Aber habt Ihr es auch verdient?"

languages.text: 「お前が今持っているものはすべて、何の苦労もなく与えられたものだ。だが、お前はそれに相応しいのか？」
languages.original_text: "Everything you now have was served to you on a silver platter. But do you deserve it?"

traits.locale_text: 「お前が今持っているものはすべて、何の苦労もなく与えられたものだ。だが、お前はそれに相応しいのか？」

languages.text: "Sahip olduğun her şey sana altın tepside sunuldu. Tüm bunları hak ediyor musun ki?"
languages.original_text: "Everything you now have was served to you on a silver platter. But do you deserve it?"

traits.locale_text: "Sahip olduğun her şey sana altın tepside sunuldu. Tüm bunları hak ediyor musun ki?"
